content:
When I try to run x.py check library/core --stage 1 on master, the build fails, starting with the following errors:

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `core`

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `compiler_builtins`

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`

and then ~11k lines of unresolved import errors. I've already tried deleting the build folder and starting again. Does anyone know what's going on here?
@DrMeepster Is there a particular reason you are passing --stage 1? I would just remove that if you don't need it.
@Eric Huss I was using --stage 1 for testing a modified rustc, but the problem still happens on master without any changes.
Huh, it doesn't seem to happen when building std, just checking. Strange.
